title: Pathways to Progress: Insights from Six Years of Programming
summary: This report produced by the Citi Foundation offers insights and lessons learned since launching Pathways to Progress in 2014. Case studies derived from Pathways programs around the world illustrate key themes as the Foundation strives to help close the job-skills mismatch in response to the persistent, global issue of youth unemployment
tag-1: Pathways to Progress: Insights from Six Years of Programming
